https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sNHC0Di97SNZTXkaHEquNEuWycU.jpg What happened to those vedettes who represented the mexican cabaret’s exotic beauty in the ‘70s and ‘80s? Four decades after the end of their roles, they tell their stories with dignity. Beauties of the Night
